text: "Hail to the King" is a 2013 song by American heavy metal band Avenged Sevenfold and is the title track to their sixth studio album Hail to the King. It went to number 83 in the United States, number 76 in the United Kingdom, number 72 in Scotland and number 63 in Canada. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2013 songs Category:Avenged Sevenfold songs Category:Heavy metal
title: Hail to the King (song)
